Optionsand pricing

All prices quoted with GST.
BOOK NOW or CALL 0488 494 345
COLOUR
CONSULTATION
We understand and teach you how to bring out the best in your natural colouring by using colour drapes to show how different colours, their shades and tones can either lift or fade your complexion. This leads to creation of your colour profile - a take-home and take-shopping guide for choosing the most complimentary clothes and accessories. We shall also be looking at your current make up and how the correct colours will enhance your look.
Investment: $330
PERSONAL STYLE
EVALUATION
We start with a, proven questionnaire that explores different style preferences and helps you understand yours - delivered in a simple shopping guide.
 
Then we evaluate body type, proportion and scale before applying this to suitable clothing and accessories that will fit nicely together with your personality and style preferences. you will by now already have more confidence in purchasing the pieces that get people commenting.
Investment: $420
WARDROBE
REVIEW
Sometimes the answer is right in front of you! Rather than simply discard what you have and start again, this fun session reviews whatâ€™s hiding in your wardrobe that can be saved, revamped and that which needs to be thanked and put aside. We then create some combinations that work, take a photo record and discuss your next necessary purchase. You will be left with a well organised, manageable wardrobe.
Investment: $330
SHOPPING
WITH A CONSULTANT
 
 
We start with a pre-shopping reconnaissance to source best options based on your requirements, so we do not waste any time or money. Then together we get down to the serious business of shopping for the perfect items that you can mix and match and love many times over.
Investment: $330
PERSONAL
DEVELOPMENT
 
 
Looking great is only one part of the story. This one-on-one session reveals tips and tricks to project an image of confidence across key features such as body language, walk, posture, eye contact, facial movement and voice coaching - the all important skills that can give you the edge in both your personal and professional life.
Investment: $165
GIFT VOUCHERS
 
The perfect gift for someone close to you, our gift vouchers are a popular choice and can be tailored to one or more of our standard packages below.
 
"Best Friends Together" is a great way to share the experience, where we offer an additional 10% saving for 2-in-1 bookings.
